title: Diagnostic & Statistical Manual of Mental Illness
description: Learn how to diagnose the mentally ill. Identify the alarming statistics and origins. Through an examination of various case studies of specific individuals, this manual aids in recognizing many forms of mental disorders, including: megalomania sadism narcissism the "God" complex sociopaths delusions of grandeur hallucinations paranoia sycophants manic disorders pathological egotists Schizophrenia   The American Psychopathic Association offers the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Illness to help readers understand the epidemic of psychiatric disorders from the past all the way up to the present.
author: Ian Tinny
